data.name: RTK13WPK - Weekly Famitsu tie-up Officer CG "Saki Suzuki" 週刊ファミ通タイアップ武将CG「2代目ゲーマーズエンジェル 鈴木咲」
data.detailed_description:
Officer graphics for 2nd Generation Gamer's Angel "Saki Suzuki" will be added.

▼To Use
Select "EDIT." Under "EDIT ORIGINAL OFFICERS" choose "CREATE ORIGINAL OFFICER" and select the Female Auto-create face graphic. The face graphic selection screen will appear. Choose the Weekly Famitsu 2nd Generation Gamer's Angel "Saki Suzuki" from the Special edition.
Following this, you will be able to use it in the MAIN MODE.
data.about_the_game:
Officer graphics for 2nd Generation Gamer's Angel "Saki Suzuki" will be added.

▼To Use
Select "EDIT." Under "EDIT ORIGINAL OFFICERS" choose "CREATE ORIGINAL OFFICER" and select the Female Auto-create face graphic. The face graphic selection screen will appear. Choose the Weekly Famitsu 2nd Generation Gamer's Angel "Saki Suzuki" from the Special edition.
Following this, you will be able to use it in the MAIN MODE.
data.short_description: Officer graphic for 2nd Generation Gamer's Angel "Saki Zuzuki" will be added.

fullgame.name: ROMANCE OF THE THREE KINGDOMS XIII / 三國志13

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows® 10, Windows® 8.1, Windows® 7, Windows Vista®
  • Processor: Pentium®4 1.6GHz or over
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 1024×768 over or 1280×720 over display
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 7 GB available space
  • Sound Card: 16 bit stereo, 48KHz WAVE file can be played
  • Additional Notes: Shader model: Version 3.0, VRAM: 256MB over
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows® 10, Windows® 8.1, Windows® 7, Windows Vista®
  • Processor: Core2 Duo 2.0GHz or over
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 1024×768 over or 1280×720 over display
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 7 GB available space
  • Sound Card: 16 bit stereo, 48KHz WAVE file can be played
  • Additional Notes: Shader model: Version 3.0, VRAM: 512MB over
